name: Yellow Chartreuse
description: Yellow Chartreuse is a herbal liqueur made by the Carthusian monks in France. It is a milder and slightly sweeter version of Green Chartreuse, another famous liqueur produced by the same monks. Yellow Chartreuse is characterized by its yellow color and a complex flavor profile derived from a secret blend of 130 herbs and botanicals. It has a sweet and honeyed taste with herbal, floral, and spicy notes.
